name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience delivering high-performance applications in diverse environments. Proficient in **Go**, **Linux**, and **Postgres** to implement scalable solutions. Skilled in **Java**, **C#**, and **C++** for software development and maintenance. Experienced in automation and distributed systems, enabling seamless integration and enhancement of applications.
Demonstrated ability to build AI/ML-powered platforms supporting predictive analytics and real-time processing, combining skills in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. Capable of frontend and backend development utilizing **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**.
Adept at deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, implementing microservices, and CI/CD pipelines with a strong background in compliance-driven development, ensuring alignment with standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Additionally experienced in MLOps, focusing on model training and orchestration with **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
